Arcane Breadth.name: Arcane Breadth
Arcane Breadth.description:
**Prerequisites** Basic Wizard Spellcasting

---

You can cast more arcane spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from wizard archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Bloodline Breadth.name: Bloodline Breadth
Bloodline Breadth.description:
**Prerequisites** Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting

---

Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more spells of your bloodline's tradition each day. Increase the number of spells in your repertoire and number of spell slots you gain from sorcerer archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Divine Breadth.name: Divine Breadth
Divine Breadth.description:
**Prerequisites** Basic Cleric Spellcasting

---

You can cast more divine spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from cleric archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Inspirational Performance.name: Inspirational Performance
Inspirational Performance.description:
**Prerequisites** Bard Dedication

---

You gain the *inspire courage* composition cantrip.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Monk Moves.name: Monk Moves
Monk Moves.description:
**Prerequisites** Monk Dedication

---

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed when you're not wearing armor.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Mysterious Breadth.name: Mysterious Breadth
Mysterious Breadth.description:
**Prerequisites** Basic Oracle Spellcasting

---

Increase the spell slots you gain from oracle archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Occult Breadth.name: Occult Breadth
Occult Breadth.description:
**Prerequisites** Basic Bard Spellcasting

---

Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more occult spells each day. Increase the number of spells in your repertoire and the number of spell slots you gain from bard archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Patron's Breadth.name: Patron's Breadth
Patron's Breadth.description:
**Prerequisites** Basic Witch Spellcasting

---

You can cast more spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from witch archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Primal Breadth.name: Primal Breadth
Primal Breadth.description:
**Prerequisites** Basic Druid Spellcasting

---

Increase the spell slots you gain from druid archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Skill Mastery (Investigator).name: Skill Mastery (Investigator)
Skill Mastery (Investigator).description:
**Prerequisites** Investigator Dedication, trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill

---

Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master and in another of your skills from trained to expert. You gain a skill feat associated with one of the skills you chose.

**Special** You can select this feat up to five times.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Skill Mastery (Rogue).name: Skill Mastery (Rogue)
Skill Mastery (Rogue).description:
**Prerequisites** Rogue Dedication, trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill

---

Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master and in another of your skills from trained to expert. You gain a skill feat associated with one of the skills you chose.

**Special** You can select this feat up to five times.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.

Swashbuckler's Speed.name: Swashbuckler's Speed
Swashbuckler's Speed.description:
**Prerequisites** Swashbuckler Dedication

---

You move faster, with or without panache. Increase the status bonus to your Speeds when you have panache to a +10-foot status bonus; you also gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speeds when you don't have panache.

## Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.
